Description: Creating, updating, or maintaining a budget for one's income and expenses
Includes physically writing checks, electronic payments, setting up auto-pay, and remembering to make payments on time
Filing and/or paying taxes. May include state, federal, real estate, or other kinds of taxes
Generating a meal plan for any period of time. May also include creating a shopping list for groceries
Creating a time-specific plan for any length of time. Includes maintaining a calendar of upcoming events/appointments
